mapper.insert: insert into plan(name, project_id, module_id, plan_id, "describe", acceptance_criteria, priority, create_by, create_time, plan_phase, plan_status, handle_by) VALUES ( #{name}, #{projectId}, #{moduleId}, #{planId}, #{describe}, #{acceptanceCriteria}, #{priority}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},'${planPhase}','${planStatus}', #{handleBy})
mapper.select: select id, name, project_id, module_id, plan_id, "describe", acceptance_criteria, priority, create_by, create_time, plan_phase, plan_status from "plan" a where a.id=#{id}
